div.div:
docs: update README for clarity and additional information
- Removed duplicate deployment note for clarity. - Reformatted container usage instructions for better readability. - Added acknowledgment for contributions and clarified licensing information.
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im>

feat: 移除所有圖片懶載入功能 (Remove All Image Lazy Loading) (#44)
This PR completely removes all image lazy loading functionality from the website to provide immediate image loading for better user experience.
## Changes Made
### HTML Modifications - Removed all `loading="lazy"` attributes from 10 images across the site - Converted 6 `data-src` attributes to `src` attributes for immediate loading - Preserved `fetchpriority="high"` attributes for critical above-the-fold images
### JavaScript Cleanup - Removed `initLazyLoading()` method and its initialization call from `main.js` - Removed `setupLazyLoading()` method and its initialization call from `research-results-tabs.js` - Simplified `loadExperimentImages()` method to remove artificial loading delays - Cleaned up IntersectionObserver components that were storing lazy loading observers
### CSS Cleanup - Removed `img[loading='lazy']` transition styles - Removed `.lazy` and `.loaded` class styles for blur/opacity effects - Removed shimmer animation effects specifically for lazy loading (`img[data-src]`) - Preserved essential image optimization and transition styles for other interactions
## Impact
**Before:** Images used multi-layered lazy loading with IntersectionObserver API, `data-src` attributes, loading animations, and blur effects.
**After:** All images load immediately when the page loads, providing instant visual feedback to users.
## Screenshots
**Hero Section Working Correctly:** ![Hero section with particle animation system running smoothly](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/d060133a-e873-469b-8ee9-0f8e08040fa4)
**Experimental Images Loading Immediately:** ![All 6 experimental images displaying without lazy loading delays](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/ace7fd79-5b52-486d-9797-5e4dc0e29601)
## Technical Validation
-
All images load immediately without delays -
No console errors or broken functionality -
ESLint validation passes -
Responsive design maintained across all devices -
Website performance and functionality fully preserved
The changes result in a cleaner codebase with improved user experience through immediate image visibility while maintaining all existing functionality.
Fixes #43.

Complete removal of all image lazy loading functionality
Co-authored-by: jim60105 <16995691+jim60105@users.noreply.github.com>
Closed #43 移除所有圖片懶載入功能 (Remove All Image Lazy Loading)
Merged #44 移除所有圖片懶載入功能 (Remove All Image Lazy Loading)
